Single lane alternating traffic. Night time milling and paving. Reduce speed. Watch for crew and equipment. Watch for uneven pavement and milled surfaces. Last updated Sun Jun 30 at 1:51 PM PDT. (DBC-65695)

events.headline: CONSTRUCTION
events.description: Highway 10, westbound. Construction work between 168 St and 160 St for 1.6 km (Surrey). Until Fri Aug 9. From 9:30 AM to 2:30 PM PDT daily. Watch for trucks turning in and out of property. Speed reduction to 60km/h. Last updated Thu Jun 20 at 8:44 AM PDT. (DBC-65376)

events.headline: INCIDENT
events.description: Highway 77. There is a wildfire between the start of Highway 77 and the end of Highway 77 for 137.6 km (138 km south of British Columbia and Northwest Territory Border to British Columbia and Northwest Territory Border). Road closed. Next update time Wed Jul 10 at 12:00 PM MST. Last updated Tue Jul 9 at 7:34 PM MST. (DBC-66043)

events.headline: CONSTRUCTION
events.description: Highway 97. Electrical maintenance planned at 15th Ave (Prince George). Starting Thu Jul 11 at 9:00 AM PDT until Thu Jul 11 at 12:00 PM PDT. Left Turn Signal Pole in Center of Median on North Side of 15th Under Repair. Southbound Left Turn Lane Closed for the Duration of Repairs. Traffic Control on Site, Please Obey all TCP Personnel and Signage. Last updated Tue Jul 9 at 9:36 AM PDT. (DBC-66014)
events.+ivr_message: Highway 97. Electrical maintenance planned at 15th Ave (Prince George). Starting Thursday, July 11 at 9:00 AM until Thursday, July 11 at 12:00 PM. Left Turn Signal Pole in Center of Median on North Side of 15th Under Repair. Southbound Left Turn Lane Closed for the Duration of Repairs. Traffic Control on Site, Please Obey all TCP Personnel and Signage. Last updated Tuesday, July 9 at 9:36 AM.

events.headline: CONSTRUCTION
events.description: Highway 97 (Alaska Highway). Shoulder maintenance between Pingel Creek Rd and Taylor Bridge for 5.9 km (6 km south of Taylor to Taylor). Until Thu Jul 11 at 3:30 PM MST. From 7:00 AM to 3:30 PM MST on Wednesday and Thursday. Expect minor delays. South Taylor Hill, pilot led single lane alternating traffic. Speed reductions to 50km/h. Watch for crews and follow traffic control. Last updated Wed Jul 10 at 2:28 AM MST. (DBC-66041)
events.+ivr_message: Highway 97 (Alaska Highway). Shoulder maintenance between Pingel Creek Rd and Taylor Bridge for 5.9 km (6 km south of Taylor to Taylor). Until Thursday, July 11 at 3:30 PM. From 7:00 AM to 3:30 PM on Wednesday and Thursday. Expect minor delays. South Taylor Hill, pilot led single lane alternating traffic. Speed reductions to 50km/h. Watch for crews and follow traffic control. Last updated Wednesday, July 10 at 2:28 AM.

events.headline: WEATHER_CONDITION
events.description: Highway 16 (Yellowhead Highway). Limited visibility with smoke between Chimdemash Loop and East - Binwall for 5.8 km (27 to 33 km west of Cedarvale). Wildfire visible from highway. No stopping. Last updated Tue Jul 9 at 4:02 PM PDT. (DBC-66037)
